description:
• 13 Lectures with over 3 Hours of content!
  • See why Modo is one of the fastest 3D applications around and why more and more people are switching to it!
  • Learn techniques that will save you lots of time!
  • Improve your modeling and texturing skills!
  • By the end of the course you will have a high quality render and the skills to composite it in After Effects!

This 3D tutorial is structured so that you can get the most out of the modeling and rendering process. We will explore the most useful tools inside of Modo and you'll discover how easy it is to create a 3D image.

Get started in Modo today and you won't look back! Learn how to use some of the best modeling tools on the market!

I've been using Modo for over 8 years and I've found the most efficient ways of creating high quality renders. With my experience and Modo's amazing tool set, you'll be on your way to creating better images in less time!
title: Modo Tutorial - Learn The Art of Modeling And Rendering
